casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Jaired Antonio Jones No. 15P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, Jaired Jones, for Jones, Jaried Antonio. Donna Elizabeth Tanner, Attorney at Law, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of October 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
